update_content:
If you cant update, please go to beetvapk.me or use filelinked code below to download latest version.

- Add several Google Video link providers.

- Add several Real-debrid link providers.

- Improve subtitle text look.
description_player: Best player to work with BeeTV. Less ads and better streaming!
